scene_description_enriched: A female saint, identified by a golden halo, is depicted in a devotional pose. She wears a blue garment with puffed sleeves and a red mantle draped over her shoulders. In her left hand, she holds a sword with a golden pommel, resting its blade on the ground. In her right hand, she holds an open book, its pages filled with text. The background is a deep black, suggesting a metaphysical or symbolic space, with a golden border framing the image.
